name: Clorox Disinfecting All-Purpose Cleaner 32 Oz and Bathroom Cleaner, Household Essentials, 30 Oz, Pack of 3
short_description: BLEACH FREE DISINFECTANT: Clorox Disinfecting All Purpose Cleaner is formulated without bleach, but doesn’t compromise the cleaning power you need in your home
ALL PURPOSE CLEANER: This Clorox disinfectant is great for everyday use and effectively cleans messes, including grease, grime and soap scum
BATHROOM CLEANER: Make your bathroom sparkle with Clorox Disinfecting Bathroom Cleaner in a spray bottle that cleans and disinfects sinks, toilet exteriors and showers
KILLS 99.9% OF BACTERIA AND VIRUSES: These Clorox disinfecting cleaners kill 99.9% of bacteria and viruses* and are proven to kill the COVID-19 virus*
BLEACH-FREE: These powerful cleaning sprays in a bleach-free formula are fortified with dependable Clorox cleaning power to eliminate any of your household surface messes without harsh odors
product_description: This value pack of all-purpose and disinfecting bathroom cleaners gives you Clorox cleaning power without the bleach. Clorox Disinfecting All Purpose Cleaner kills 99.9% of bacteria and viruses* and is proven to kill the COVID-19 virus*, no bleach necessary. It prevents odor-causing bacteria growth on hard, nonporous surfaces. Great for everyday use, this Clorox spray can be used on many hard, non porous surfaces in your home. Reach for it to clean messes including grease, grime and soap scum. When it’s time to clean the bathroom, reach for Clorox Disinfecting Bathroom Cleaner. Use on tubs, glazed tile, toilet exteriors, sinks and counters. *All- Purpose Cleaner kills Escherichia coli O157:H7, Staphylococcus aureus (staph), Salmonella enterica (Salmonella); Influenza AVirus (Flu Virus); Bathroom Cleaner kills Staphylococcus aureus, Salmonella enterica, Influenza A Virus, Respiratory Syncytial Virus, Rhinovirus Type 37. Kills SARS-CoV-2 on hard, nonporous surfaces. Use as directed.

product_description: This tuberculocidal, virucidal, fungicidal and bactericidal formula kills 99.9% of germs on hard, nonporous surfaces and is effective against over 50 microorganisms including H1N1 (Influenza A virus) MRSA, Norovirus, Rhinovirus, Poliovirus Type 1, Hepatitis A virus, Hepatitis B virus and HIV-1 (AIDS Virus).* This product eliminates odors and prevents the growth of mold and mildew. Use on showers, sinks, countertops, around toilet areas, toys, telephones, garbage bins, waiting rooms and in laboratories. Lysol disinfectant spray is a hospital-grade spray and kills 99.9 percent of viruses, including norovirus, which causes the stomach flu. It also eliminates 99.9 percent of bacteria and fungi, helping to control the growth of mold and mildew, remove odors, and prevent seasonal colds, flu, and allergies.

name: OdoBan Ready-to-Use 360-Degree Continuous Spray Disinfectant and Harsh Aroma Eliminator, Fabric and Air Freshener, 6 Pack, 14.6 Ounces Each, Original Eucalyptus Scent Clear
short_description: Multi-Purpose: Our continuous cleaning spray is ready to use; it cleans, disinfects, sanitizes, freshens, and eliminates unpleasant stenches. The can features 360-degree continuous spray technology to spray at any angle - even upside down.

Multi-Surface: Our ready-to-use formula can be used on any non-porous household surface plus upholstery, carpets, and bedding. Use on countertops, floors, trash cans, and more. Cleans up messes and smells.

Multi-Use Spray: Make cleaning your home or office more convenient than ever. Not only is our versatile cleaning and disinfecting spray effective, but it doubles as an air freshener or fabric and laundry refresher. Leaves no residue.

Where to Use: Our sanitizing spray can be used in many settings like homes, offices, stores, schools, gyms, locker rooms, and more. It can be used in daycares, hospitals, care facilities, cafeterias, restaurants, and public transportation.

Disinfection Directions: Spray 6-8 inches away from the surface. Clean with a sponge, brush, or cloth (do not inhale). This package includes six continuous cleaning sprays (14.6 ounces each) in a pleasant, refreshing eucalyptus scent.
product_description: The OdoBan ready-to-use 360-degree continuous disinfecting and freshening spray does the job of many products in one. It removes bad smells plus dirty messes with an easy-to-use spray can that works at any angle, even upside down. So don't just mask that unpleasant aroma; eliminate dirty, harsh smells with our original eucalyptus scented disinfectant. This bulk multi-pack comes with six 14.6 ounce disinfectant deodorizers. It disinfects and cleans non-porous surfaces while leaving a fresh scent. Our convenient spray in the original multi-purpose formula is ready to tackle your biggest mess or smell. It also helps clean and freshen areas with moldy and mildewy smells, especially areas affected by flood and water damage. Clean your space while leaving a fresh fragrance behind with our smell removal solution. It's a versatile and effective cleaner, disinfectant, sanitizer, and home freshener that leaves no residue, and works effortlessly to disinfect on many types of household surfaces and even natural stone or granite countertops. It's also an effective eliminator of harsh aromas and stenches including pet urine aftermath in carpet, upholstery, and more. It can even stand up to the smell of smoke and can be used for washing walls, doorknobs, sinks, and tubs. Not only is it an exceptional cleaner, but it's a great air freshener and will remove harsh smells from any room, kitchen, or bathroom. The room freshener is also a great way to refresh closets, fabrics, and laundry. OdoBan products can be used in both households and business facilities of all types including schools and daycares, hospitals, nursing homes, in ambulances, buses, and trains, in airplanes, cars, and taxis, and in restaurants and cafeterias. At OdoBan, we believe in creating quality products that are as effective as they are affordable with a motto of ""if we don't love using it ourselves, we don't make it here. Make life fresh with OdoBan.

product_description: Lysol Disinfectant Spray kills 99.9% of bacteria and viruses*, including cold, flu, Norovirus, and Covid-19 virus (when used as directed). This disinfectant spray sanitizes, disinfects and eliminates odor-causing bacteria on surfaces. Use this disinfecting spray on high touch hard & soft surface areas. Let Lysol bring you and your family peace of mind when it comes to disinfecting against germs. You can also use this disinfecting spray on soft surfaces, like couches, coats, sports bags, strollers and backpacks. It can be used on over 100 surfaces and leaves behind a refreshing lavender & cotton blossom scent you'll love. *When used as directed. Kills 99.9% of Staphylococcus aureus and Klebsiella pneumoniae in 30 seconds on soft surfaces. Kills SARS-CoV-2 on hard, non-porous surfaces in 15 seconds. Kills Rhinovirus Type 39 and Influenza A Virus (H1N1) on hard, non-porous surfaces in 30 seconds. Kills Escherichia coli O157:H7, Salmonella enterica, Staphylococcus aureus, Influenza A Virus (New Caledonia/20/99) and Respiratory Syncytial Virus on hard, non-porous surfaces in 3 minutes. Kills 99.9% of Enterobacter aerogenes and Staphylococcus aureus on hard, non-porous, non-food contact surfaces in 10 seconds.
